title: refactor(http): extract duplicate auth string copying helper
body:
## Summary
Extract duplicate authentication credential copying logic into a helper function.

## Problem
Identical auth string copying pattern appears twice:
- Lines 1869-1874
- Lines 2107-2112

Both copy username/password/token using `socket_util_arena_strdup()`.

## Location
- File: `src/http/SocketHTTPClient.c`
- Lines: 1869-1874 and 2107-2112

## Proposed Solution
Extract helper function:
```c
static void
httpclient_auth_copy_to_arena(Arena_T arena, 
                               SocketHTTPClient_Auth *dest,
                               const SocketHTTPClient_Auth *src);
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Single auth copying helper function
- [ ] Both call sites updated
- [ ] Tests pass with sanitizers
- [ ] ~12 lines saved

## Labels
refactor, redundancy, http
